item.title: Visual Studio 2012 – Paste Special Feature
item.description: Generally the longest and most frustrating part of using a 3rd party API is making all the C# classes that the data will plugin to after you make requests into those API's.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
